questions.question_text: When should the MAC authentication bypass feature be used on a switch port?

choices.D: when authentication should be bypassed for select hosts based on their MAC address
choices.C: when authentication is required, but the attached host does not support 802.1X
choices.A: when the attached host supports 802.1X and must authenticate itself based on its MAC address instead of user credentials
choices.B: when the attached host supports limited 802.1X
